data.comment: The big names in today's match at Gewiss Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Free kick Atalanta.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hellas Verona are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 14, Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Atalanta have a goal kick.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
Throw-in Atalanta.
Atalanta are pushing forward but Josip Ilicic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 18, Davide Massa awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 20, Atalanta push upfield but Davide Massa quickly pulls them for offside.
Davide Massa awards the home team a throw-in.
In Bergamo Atalanta attack through Remo Freuler. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Gewiss Stadium.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Atalanta.
Davide Massa signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Atalanta's half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
In the minute 23, Atalanta's Johan Mojica gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bergamo.
Atalanta are whistled for offside.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Atalanta.
In the minute 32, Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hellas Verona's half?
Andrea Danzi is replacing Matteo Lovato for the away team.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Gewiss Stadium.
Davide Massa signals a Atalanta throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 34, Papu Gomez of Atalanta smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 35, Davide Massa awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Atalanta have an attacking throw-in.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Atalanta just outside Hellas Verona's area.
In the minute 39, At Gewiss Stadium, Federico Ceccherini has been yellow-carded for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bergamo.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hellas Verona drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 44, Pawel Dawidowicz is booked for the away team.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Hellas Verona.
Johan Mojica (Atalanta) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
In the minute 45, Davide Massa will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Papu Gomez for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Bergamo.
The second-half has started.
Miguel Veloso is on a sub for Andrea Danzi for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 49, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Hellas Verona's area.
Atalanta push forward at Gewiss Stadium and Josip Ilicic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hellas Verona defence.
In the minute 52, Papu Gomez (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rafael Toloi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atalanta.
Miguel Veloso (Hellas Verona) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Hellas Verona defenders.
In the minute 55, Atalanta push upfield and Hans Hateboer gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Hellas Verona defence.
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Hellas Verona.
In Bergamo, Rafael Toloi of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 57, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Hellas Verona surge into the attack at Gewiss Stadium but Samuel Di Carmine’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bergamo.
In the minute 58, Hellas Verona make their third substitution with Eddie Salcedo replacing Samuel Di Carmine.
Ebrima Colley is replacing Ivan Ilic for Hellas Verona at Gewiss Stadium.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Hellas Verona.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Rafael Toloi for Atalanta has been booked by Davide Massa and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Miguel Veloso.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Duvan Zapata with Luis Muriel.
Gian Piero Gasperini is making the team's second substitution at Gewiss Stadium with Sam Lammers replacing Josip Ilicic.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 65, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pierluigi Gollini for Atalanta who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in Atalanta.
Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) is making a third change, with Marco Sportiello replacing the possibly injured Pierluigi Gollini.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Hellas Verona.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 69, Davide Massa awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Hellas Verona are coming forward and Federico Dimarco gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
In the minute 71, Atalanta's Luis Muriel breaks free at Gewiss Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Free kick Atalanta.
In the minute 72, Throw-in Hellas Verona.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Federico Ceccherini.
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) has taken off Federico Ceccherini who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Andrea Favilli is the replacement.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Hellas Verona's Andrea Favilli breaks free at Gewiss Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) is making a fourth substitution, with Amad Traore replacing Johan Mojica.
In the minute 78, Davide Massa signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 78, Luis Muriel's header is off-target for Atalanta.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Gewiss Stadium.
Atalanta make their fifth substitution with Matteo Ruggeri replacing Papu Gomez.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 80, Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta's Amad Traore has been booked in Bergamo.
Davide Massa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Atalanta.
Miguel Veloso (Hellas Verona) has received a first yellow card.
Mattia Zaccagni puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 83, Miguel Veloso with an assist there.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luis Muriel for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
Hellas Verona's Ebrima Colley is on target but unsuccessful.
Atalanta's Amad Traore gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Rafael Toloi of Atalanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
Davide Massa awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Bergamo Atalanta drive forward through Hans Hateboer. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Important block from the Hellas Verona defence as Hans Hateboer fires in a strike for Atalanta.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
